event.description: Fred Lewis called out on strikes.
Edgar Renteria grounds out, shortstop Troy Tulowitzki to first baseman Todd Helton.
Pablo Sandoval doubles (7) on a fly ball to right fielder Ryan Spilborghs.
Bengie Molina grounds out, shortstop Troy Tulowitzki to first baseman Todd Helton.
Aaron Rowand grounds out, shortstop Troy Tulowitzki to first baseman Todd Helton.
Randy Winn lines out to left fielder Matt Murton.
Travis Ishikawa flies out to center fielder Dexter Fowler.
Emmanuel Burriss flies out to center fielder Dexter Fowler.
Randy Johnson grounds out to first baseman Todd Helton.
Fred Lewis singles on a line drive to center fielder Dexter Fowler.
Edgar Renteria grounds out, third baseman Garrett Atkins to first baseman Todd Helton.
Pablo Sandoval flies out to center fielder Dexter Fowler.
Bengie Molina strikes out swinging.
Aaron Rowand lines out to right fielder Ryan Spilborghs.
Randy Winn singles on a ground ball to left fielder Matt Murton.
Travis Ishikawa grounds into a double play, second baseman Clint Barmes to shortstop Troy Tulowitzki to first baseman Todd Helton. Randy Winn out at 2nd.
Emmanuel Burriss called out on strikes.
Randy Johnson grounds out, third baseman Garrett Atkins to first baseman Todd Helton.
Fred Lewis called out on strikes.
Edgar Renteria strikes out swinging.
Pablo Sandoval strikes out swinging.
Bengie Molina lines out to right fielder Ryan Spilborghs.
Aaron Rowand hit by pitch.
Randy Winn walks. Aaron Rowand to 2nd.
With Travis Ishikawa batting, wild pitch by Ubaldo Jimenez, Aaron Rowand to 3rd.
Travis Ishikawa pops out to shortstop Troy Tulowitzki.
Defensive Substitution: Ian Stewart replaces first baseman Todd Helton, batting 4th, playing third base.
Defensive switch from third base to first base for Garrett Atkins.
Emmanuel Burriss singles on a ground ball to left fielder Matt Murton.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Eugenio Velez replaces Osiris Matos.
Eugenio Velez hits a ground-rule double (1) on a fly ball down the left-field line. Emmanuel Burriss to 3rd.
Pitching Change: Jason Grilli replaces Ubaldo Jimenez, batting 9th.
Fred Lewis strikes out swinging.
Juan Uribe grounds out, shortstop Troy Tulowitzki to first baseman Garrett Atkins. Emmanuel Burriss scores. Eugenio Velez to 3rd.
Pablo Sandoval flies out to left fielder Matt Murton.
Pitching Change: Manny Corpas replaces Jason Grilli, batting 3rd, replacing right fielder Ryan Spilborghs.
Defensive switch from left field to right field for Matt Murton.
Seth Smith remains in the game as the left fielder.
Steve Holm grounds out, third baseman Ian Stewart to first baseman Garrett Atkins.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Rich Aurilia replaces Brandon Medders.
Rich Aurilia grounds out, third baseman Ian Stewart to first baseman Garrett Atkins.
Nate Schierholtz strikes out swinging.
Dexter Fowler flies out to right fielder Randy Winn.
Troy Tulowitzki flies out to right fielder Randy Winn.
Ryan Spilborghs lines out to second baseman Emmanuel Burriss.
Todd Helton grounds out, second baseman Emmanuel Burriss to first baseman Travis Ishikawa.
Garrett Atkins grounds out, shortstop Edgar Renteria to first baseman Travis Ishikawa.
Matt Murton grounds out, second baseman Emmanuel Burriss to first baseman Travis Ishikawa.
Yorvit Torrealba walks.
Clint Barmes walks. Yorvit Torrealba to 2nd.
Ubaldo Jimenez out on a sacrifice bunt, third baseman Pablo Sandoval to second baseman Emmanuel Burriss. Yorvit Torrealba to 3rd. Clint Barmes to 2nd.
Dexter Fowler out on a sacrifice fly to center fielder Aaron Rowand. Yorvit Torrealba scores. Clint Barmes to 3rd.
Troy Tulowitzki flies out to center fielder Aaron Rowand.
Ryan Spilborghs grounds out, shortstop Edgar Renteria to first baseman Travis Ishikawa.
Todd Helton singles on a line drive to center fielder Aaron Rowand.
Garrett Atkins grounds into a double play, third baseman Pablo Sandoval to second baseman Emmanuel Burriss to first baseman Travis Ishikawa. Todd Helton out at 2nd.
Matt Murton homers (1) on a fly ball to left field.
Yorvit Torrealba homers (2) on a fly ball to right field.
Clint Barmes grounds out, third baseman Pablo Sandoval to first baseman Travis Ishikawa.
Ubaldo Jimenez singles on a ground ball to shortstop Edgar Renteria.
Dexter Fowler singles on a ground ball to left fielder Fred Lewis. Ubaldo Jimenez to 2nd.
Troy Tulowitzki grounds into a double play, shortstop Edgar Renteria to second baseman Emmanuel Burriss to first baseman Travis Ishikawa. Dexter Fowler out at 2nd.
Ryan Spilborghs walks.
Todd Helton doubles (5) on a line drive to right fielder Randy Winn. Ryan Spilborghs to 3rd.
Garrett Atkins reaches on a fielder's choice, fielded by third baseman Pablo Sandoval.
With Matt Murton batting, Bengie Molina picks off Ryan Spilborghs at 3rd on throw to Pablo Sandoval.
Matt Murton grounds into a force out, third baseman Pablo Sandoval to second baseman Emmanuel Burriss. Todd Helton to 3rd. Garrett Atkins out at 2nd. Matt Murton to 1st.
Yorvit Torrealba singles on a line drive to right fielder Randy Winn. Todd Helton scores. Matt Murton to 2nd.
Clint Barmes doubles (5) on a line drive to left fielder Fred Lewis. Matt Murton scores. Yorvit Torrealba scores.
Pitching Change: Osiris Matos replaces Randy Johnson, batting 9th.
Ubaldo Jimenez singles on a line drive to right fielder Randy Winn. Clint Barmes scores.
Dexter Fowler strikes out swinging.
Defensive Substitution: Juan Uribe replaces shortstop Edgar Renteria, batting 2nd, playing shortstop.
Defensive Substitution: Steve Holm replaces catcher Bengie Molina, batting 4th, playing catcher.
Defensive Substitution: Nate Schierholtz replaces right fielder Randy Winn, batting 6th, playing right field.
Troy Tulowitzki pops out to first baseman Travis Ishikawa in foul territory.
Ryan Spilborghs lines out to center fielder Aaron Rowand.
Todd Helton homers (3) on a fly ball to right field.
Garrett Atkins flies out to right fielder Nate Schierholtz.
Pitching Change: Brandon Medders replaces Osiris Matos, batting 5th, replacing center fielder Aaron Rowand.
Eugenio Velez remains in the game as the center fielder.
Matt Murton grounds out, third baseman Pablo Sandoval to first baseman Travis Ishikawa.
Yorvit Torrealba walks.
Clint Barmes grounds into a force out, third baseman Pablo Sandoval to second baseman Emmanuel Burriss. Yorvit Torrealba out at 2nd. Clint Barmes to 1st.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Seth Smith replaces Jason Grilli.
Seth Smith triples (1) on a line drive to right fielder Nate Schierholtz. Clint Barmes scores.
Dexter Fowler singles on a line drive to right fielder Nate Schierholtz. Seth Smith scores.
Troy Tulowitzki doubles (3) on a fly ball to right fielder Nate Schierholtz. Dexter Fowler scores.
Ryan Spilborghs flies out to center fielder Eugenio Velez.
